content: नरः [नॄ-नये-अच्] {@--1@} A man, male, person; संयोजयति विद्यैव नीचगापि नरं सरित् . समुद्रमिव दुर्धर्षं नृपं भाग्यमतः परं <ls>H. Pr. 5</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 96</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">2. 213.</ls> {@--2@} A man or piece at chess. {@--3@} The pin of a sun-dial. {@--4@} The Supreme Spirit, the original or eternal man. {@--5@} Man's length (= पुरुष <ab>q. v.</ab>). {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a primitive sage. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of Arjuna; see नरनारायण below. {@--8@} A horse. {@--9@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) A personal termination.
